text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Here I GOOO! RAAAAAGH!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's summer camp, and Winning<n>Ticket is charging ahead
from morning<n>to night.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wow! Trainer... You're geared up!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Boooom! Well, I'm burning with<n>energy too! Like the sun!
Today we<n>see who's got the most poweeer!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Gah... Huff, puff... Y-you... okay?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah! Our pacing... needs work!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But... Hahaha! I feel... so good right<n>now!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: As soon as you went, "aaagh!," I got<n>all, like, "raaaaagh!"

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Like, charged beyond charged! Past<n>the max!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Synner-gee! Yeah, yeah... Sounds<n>strong! I like it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Full power and full synergy. If we can<n>combine the two, it
might be the<n>perfect training for her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: During our next session...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Joint training?! Whoooa, amazing!<n>WOW! I'm... getting...
puuumped!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yesterday, I burned like the sun!<n>Today, I'll... uhhh... burn
like a super<n>suuun!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
It's so hot, I'm sweating already... To<n>be honest, I just
wanna take it easy,<n>ya know?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Same here... Well, it's just one day,<n>right? Let's get it over
with.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Long-distance swimming? Sure, I'm a<n>pretty good
swimmer. How does, say,<n>about 3,000 meters sound?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I know! We'll swim to that little island<n>over there and back!
Some front<n>crawl! Butterfly! Finish with a tail<n>propeller!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! That island's, like, 5,000<n>meters from here... Hey,
wait! Hold on!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Geez! I won't be left behind! I told<n>you, I'm good at
swimming!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
The tire pull, huh? No problem.<n>Power's my specialty. I can
even<n>handle two of Tracen's super<n>heavyweight tires.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huff, wheeze. I brought us somesuper heavyweight tires.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Nice, thanks—hey, wait! You brought<n>four each?! I was just
telling you two<n>is my limit!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right! Exactly why I gotta pull four!<n>Anyway, off I gooooo!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hrnnngh! HEEEAVE!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Tch, four is no joke! Not bad. But I'm<n>not gonna lose in a
battle of strength!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: She really got one over on us.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: We wound up doing some intense<n>training, huh. But...

text_block_list.name: The Two
text_block_list.text: Our times are getting better!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While weary from the exhausting<n>training, the two
Umamusume are<n>satisfied to see their hidden potential<n>
unleashed.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: However, the biggest gainer from<n>today's practice is...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: T-T-T-T-Traineeer!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Look! My time! I'm gettingWAAAY faster!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oooh, so this was that synner-gee<n>thing!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
It's pretty amazing! Like, wow! And<n>you're amazing too,
Trainer! Super,<n>super special!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Thanks for a great day of training!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it was nice! Tiring... but it felt<n>really great!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: All right! Time to hit the sack and<n>snooooze till tomorrow—

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaait! I TOTALLY FOR-GOT!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: It's today! It's happening right now...<n>The festival!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Barely made it! Festivals mean it's<n>time to have fun, fun,
fun, and more<n>fun! Right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
We'll conquer all the yummy food<n>stalls! Join the festival
dance! And,<n>and...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah! Look, Trainer! In the sky!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Oh... Wooooow! Fireworks! All<n>booming and sparklyyy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: They're beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahhh... Those fireworks were<n>something!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you know what... The fireworks<n>went full power too. I
felt it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
"I'm the most dazzling!" "No, me!" I<n>could see them bursting
in a bright<n>battle with each other!
choice_data_list: Just like you and the others today.
Just like you and the others today.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Hey, maybe you're right!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
She's running! I'm running! We're all<n>running! An
explosion of<n>"I'm-not-gonna-lose" synner-gee for<n>ya!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But I... I'm going to be the biggest,<n>brightest explosion of
them all!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: In training, in races, and, most of all, in<n>the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The strongest Umamusume pitting<n>their fullest power
against each other!<n>No matter how many other racers rise<n>
up from that synner-gee...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'll show everyone how my full<n>power can surpass them
all... And<n>we'll win the Derby together!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Winning Ticket's vow is so powerful,<n>it feels like her
dreams can propel her<n>far off into the distance, past even
the<n>horizon.
